Articles.Content:
just gonna leave this here for those of us whom remember the days of .18 and before

 

http://www.kerbalcomics.com/
That strip ended before I started playing KSP, so it was completely new on me. Had a chuckle here and there

Ah, to be young again; with the days of that captain monkey guy who was active in "Welcome Aboard."

Unfortunately, that was several years ago.
gone but not forgotten i see
Once in a blue moon, I still check for an ending to the jeb cliffhanger.
This would have been .23 or later seeing as it's "Revert To Flight" vs what was in .18, "End Flight". A feature that debatably was useful in it's own right.
